name: Creepypasta Land MV Edition Revised
description:
Experience an all-new and improved version of Creepypasta Land!

The original game was made by Lucas Boato, who eventually would make an MV Edition of the game with combat and extra content.

This version, however, is different as it not only fixes many of the games grammar and plot elements, but it also adds new easter eggs and things to find within the game.

If you wish to take an altered trip down memory lane, here's your chance!

Disclaimer: This game was to be released on Halloween, and may receive updates and patches in the future.
